Package xing.ui.core

Interface Canvas

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Canvas
    public interface Canvas
    Provides basic functions for drawing shapes.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void drawCircle​(Point centre, double radius)
      Draw circle on the canvas.
      void drawLine​(Point start, Point stop)
      Draw line on the canvas.
      void drawRectangle​(Point topLeft, Point bottomRight)  
      void fillRectangle​(Point topLeft, Point bottomRight)  
      void setColour​(RGBColour colour)
      Change foreground colour.

    • Method Detail

      • drawCircle

        void drawCircle​(Point centre,
                double radius)
        Draw circle on the canvas.
        Parameters:
        centre - centre of the circle, coordinates relative to axis.
        radius - radius of the circle, absolute pixel size.

      • drawLine

        void drawLine​(Point start,
              Point stop)
        Draw line on the canvas.
        Parameters:
        start - start point of the line.
        stop - the other end of the line.

      • drawRectangle

        void drawRectangle​(Point topLeft,
                   Point bottomRight)

      • fillRectangle

        void fillRectangle​(Point topLeft,
                   Point bottomRight)

      • setColour

        void setColour​(RGBColour colour)
        Change foreground colour.
        Parameters:
        colour - foreground colour to switch to.
